description: Reconcile agent: read project data and create delta pack with findings

steps.userQuery: Reconcile all sources for Project Beta. Read tickets and objectives, identify coverage gaps and orphaned work.
steps.description: Reconcile agent reads data and creates delta pack

agentResponses.responseFallback:
I'll read all project data and reconcile.

<tool_call>
{"name": "read_tickets", "args": {"projectId": "project-beta"}}
</tool_call>

Reconciliation complete. Found coverage gaps and orphaned tickets. Creating delta pack.

<tool_call>
{"name": "create_delta_pack", "args": {"projectId": "project-beta", "projectName": "Project Beta", "deltas": [{"deltaType": "COVERAGE_GAP", "severity": "HIGH", "title": "Objective has no tickets", "description": "Coverage gap detected"}]}}
</tool_call>

Delta pack created with findings:
- 1 COVERAGE_GAP (HIGH)

Recommendation: Create tickets for uncovered objectives.
{"pass": true, "summary": "Reconcile agent read data, identified gaps, and created delta pack"}
